name: SnmpAgentSimulator
short_description:
- Free tool to simulate thousands of SNMP nodes from a single computer.

 - Easy to install, easy to configure, easy to use

- Test the functionality and performance of SNMP based Network management applications without using the real devices

- Simulate a large scale enterprise network in no time, at absolutely no cost!

- Uses the open-source SNMP4j internally

- Runs on all popular Linux distributions.

- Change the settings through a file that is similar to Apache httpd.conf file
summary: Simulate thousands of SNMP network nodes from a single PC
